kpi.name: M1010C184

kpi_info.title: RRC CONNECTION DROPS DURING SERVICE BASED ISHO FOR NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC connection drops during Service Based inter-system handover - by UEs with NRT connection. UPDATED:When the source RNC receives a RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND message with a failure cause from the CN - when inter-system handover procedure is ongoing. This counter is updated only when the trigger reason is Service Based HO.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONNECTION DROPS DURING SERVICE BASED ISHO FOR NRT
